text: Jože Toporišič (October 11, 1926 – December 9, 2014) was a Slovene linguist. He was the author of the most influential Slovene scientific grammar of the second half of the 20th century. He was a member of the Slovenian Academy of Sciences and Arts, and coauthor of the Academy's Slovene Normative Guide (). He was born in Mostec, near Brežice in Slovenia. Toporišič died in Ljubljana, Slovenia, aged 88. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1926 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Slovenian writers Category:Slovenian academics
title: Jože Toporišič
